meanings.definition: Having a pattern of very thin stripes, especially on fabric or clothing.
meanings.sent1: The pinstriped suit looked very elegant on him.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pinstriped shirt to the business meeting.
meanings.sent3: The pinstriped pajamas made him feel like a stylish businessman even in bed.
meanings.sent4: The road ahead was pinstriped with shadows from the tall trees.
meanings.sent5: The pinstriped design on the car made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.sent1: The pinstriped walls in the office added a touch of sophistication.
meanings.sent2: The vintage car had a pinstriped hood that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The pinstriped cake looked too good to eat, almost like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her pinstriped notebook was filled with creative ideas and doodles.
meanings.sent5: The pinstriped tie completed his formal look for the event.
